RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 88. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUDWIG bumped with rivals on both sides at the start, moved to the front then sped clear, dictated terms while inside through the turn, responded well when put to a right-handed crop while off the rail in upper stretch and held under steady urging. WICKED AGAIN broke in then was hustled, chased the pace down the backstretch, raced inside for most of the turn then shifted to the two path, was driven three wide into the stretch under a left-handed crop, drifted out some inside the three-sixteenths then was switched to a right-handed crop at the furlong marker, went back to a left-handed crop while still in pursuit of the winner at the sixteenth-pole and clearly secured the place. OPPORTUNITY SET bumped with foes on both sides at the start, settled towards the rear, was urged along in the two path on the turn, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and was along for the show. INDEX FUND was bumped at the start then taken up in tight quarters, settled well off the pace under some urging, gained three then four wide on the turn, drifted out some in upper stretch and flattened out. MACHO VILLA broke out and bumped with an opponent, was urged along at the rear, went two then three wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. METALLURGIC chased the pace on the outside then in the two path on the turn, dropped back into the stretch and tired. PARTY WITH SMARTY dropped back while urged along, fell further back while traveling a bit awkwardly leaving the backstretch, went three then four wide on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Opportunity Set
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn brk,settled,urged 2p turn,3-4path into upper,up 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Index Fund
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,in tight,tkn up,settled,gain 3-4w turn,drift out,flattnd

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Villa
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,urged along,2-3path turn,5w into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Ludwig
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn brk,sped clear,ins turn,responded,steady urging

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: LNJ Foxwoods, SB Racing Corp.,Anglo-American Thoroughbreds

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,hustled,chased,ins-2p trn,3p1/4,drift out ins3/16,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Party With Smarty
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,urged along,3-4w turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Metallurgic
ENTRY.OWNER: Nice Guys Stables and Burleson Michael L
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside, 2path turn, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Special Weight Purse 83000. (UP TO $14,442 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold or RNA for $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONEST AL bumped at the start by RUDY RUDY RUDY, who broke inwards, chased two to three wide just off the top pair, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, then got floated out to the seven path as YAQUI VALLEY came out along his inside, dug in under a drive rallying to take command a furlong from home, dug in under growing late threat to the outside and held safe to prevail. PICCATA PRINCE traded a lean at the start with STUCK ON YOU, chased inside briefly before tipping to the two path, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung two to three wide at the quarter pole, floated out to the seven path straightened away and closed well to just latch on the winner as he hit the finish. YAQUI VALLEY broke in at the start under hustling and bumped CROWN THAT SAINT, showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide at the quarter pole, then floated out five wide straightened away carrying out HONEST AL, dug in and was collared by that rival a furlong out, ran on to preserve the show honors. CPTBOBSBTWENTYNINE struck the off side stall at the start when breaking outwards and conceded four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tipped out briefly before angling inside of STUCK ON YOU a sixteenth out and kept on to the finish. UNCLE EDDIE grew fractious in the gate rearing up and forcing the rider to abandon his perch momentarily, lunged at the start conceding two to three lengths before settling into stride, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and improved position. STUCK ON YOU traded a lean at the start with PICCATA PRINCE, pressed the leader from the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, weakened in the final furlong. CROWN THAT SAINT got bumped at the start by YAQUI VALLEY breaking inwards, raced four wide and steadied at the five-eighths losing about a length of ground, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung four wide into upper stretch, got floated out to the eight path by rivals straightened away and weakened. RUDY RUDY RUDY broke in brushing the near side stall before bumping HONEST AL and conceded two lengths to the front, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Yaqui Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, hustled, in hand 3-2w, 2-3w uppr, floated out, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Stuck On You
ENTRY.COMMENT: traded lean st, pressed ins, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Piccata Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: traded lean st, ins briefly, chased 2p, 2-3w 1/4, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Cptbobsbtwentynine
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Jessica D and Brady Patrick R
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Eddie
ENTRY.OWNER: Deeb Dennis L and Seery Terence V
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, lunged st, chased 3-2w, 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Honest Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w uppr, up 1/8, safe

ENTRY.NAME: Rudy Rudy Rudy
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi Vincent S Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Cotrone Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, brush gate, bumped foe, chased 5-3w, 6w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Crown That Saint
ENTRY.OWNER: Noda Orlando Hablan Los Caballos LLC Signature Thoroughbreds and SEI Ragazzi Rac
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, steady 4w 5/8, 2p turn, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RISK PROFILE was hustled from the gate, established a good position just off the pace, drafted inside early on the turn then moved to the two path coming to the five-sixteenths, shifted four wide at the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead in upper stretch, shook clear outside the sixteenth-pole and drew away under steady handling. PRINTRACK broke out then brushed with a foe, pressed the pace on the outside of the leader, vied between foes in the two to three path on the turn, led briefly at the three-sixteenths then lost the advantage to the winner, battled with that foe into the final furlong and proved no match while clear for the place. BOURBON'S HOPE was away alertly then sent hard, showed the way under heavy pressure from his outside, vied inside to the two path on the turn, was asked for more at the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage in upper stretch and weakened but was clear for the show. MONEY MIKE was hustled from the gate then urged along off the pace, chased three then four wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and tired. ZERTZ broke a bit awkwardly, was urged along off the pace, bumped lightly with a foe at the half-mile pole, dropped from the two path to the rail early on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and failed to rally. TURNSANDCONDITIONS was urged along at the rear, went four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and was no factor. STRIKING SPEED settled on the outside, angled in late on the backstretch then bumped lightly with a foe, went three wide on the turn and failed to respond. CHARLIE FIVE O brushed with a rival at the start, stalked the pace on the outside, made a bid late on the backstretch, vied in the three to four path on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Risk Profile
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well plcd,ins-2p trn,shift 4w1/4,rallied,lead ins3/16,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Money Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged just off pace,3-4wide turn,6w into lane,tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: bit awkward brk,urged along,light bump1/2,2p-ins turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon's Hope
ENTRY.OWNER: Bowman Daniel Bowman Trey and Smith Daniel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,sent hard,pace,2p-ins turn,headed3/16,wknd,clr3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Printrack
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,brshd,pressed,btwn,3-2path turn,3path1/4,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie Five O
ENTRY.OWNER: Red Storm Stable Flower Power Stables and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,stalked outside,bid1/2,vied 3-4path turn,5p1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Turnsandconditions
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,4wide turn,5w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Speed
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables and Acqu
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,angled in 1/2,light bump,3path turn,no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Claiming Purse 50000. INNER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KARA PARA coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, tipped out three wide awkwardly when JANNIE MAE floated out slightly in front and brushed with EMBRACEABLE GAL, rallied to take command at the three-sixteenths, inched away under a drive kept to task. JESSICA'S RIDE chased along the inside, came under coaxing tipped out three wide at the seven-sixteenths, angled to the two path with five-sixteenths to go and continued just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors along well clear of the rest and second best. JANNIE MAE coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got collared at the three-sixteenths and weakened. FOLLOW THE FED coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. EMBRACEABLE GAL fractious in the gate prior to the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and was brushed by KARA PARA , dug in under a drive and weakened through to the finish. OUTTA THE CLOUD chased just off the inside coming under prolonged coaxing from the nine-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tired. STONE OF DESTINY coaxed from start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide for home and tired. STRIKING MELODY coaxed from the gate, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path getting placed to coaxing at the half mile pole, swung three wide into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish. SPERSS coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing half a mile from home, went seven wide into upper stretch eased up, cantered home towards the finish, then got pulled up just shy the wire and was walked off under his own power.

ENTRY.NAME: Kara Para
ENTRY.OWNER: Stoneybrook Farm Trust and Potash Edward C
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, tipped 3w uppr, up 3/16, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Outta the Cloud
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 9/16, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Jessica's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3w 7/16, 2w 1/4p, dug in, ran on, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Sperss
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 1/2, 7w upper, eased, pulled up

ENTRY.OWNER: Moirano John L JCI Stables Chichakly Amira and Novak Jr Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5w backstretch, coaxed 2p 1/2, 3w upper, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Jannie Mae
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Follow the Fed
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Stone of Destiny
ENTRY.OWNER: Alifyfe Racing LLC and Mawaka Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Embraceable Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 57000. (UP TO $9,918 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Tim e Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKY AND SAND disputed the pace on the outside, vied in the three the two path on the turn, shook clear inside the five-sixteenths, extended the advantage under a brisk hand ride into upper stretch, was put to one pop of a right-handed crop while drawing off into the final furlong and proved much best under a solid hand-ride from that point to the finish. MAJOR BLUE was hustled from the gate, contested the pace on the inside of a rival, dropped from the two path to the rail on the turn, shifted three wide into the stretch and safely secured the place while no match for the winner. PATIENT CAPITAL was urged along on the outside, chased five then four wide on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and weakened while able to get the show. LAUGHING BOY was urged between foes early then on the outside, advanced four then five wide on the turn, was driven six wide into the stretch and came up empty. PERFECT DAY came outward leaving the chute, pressed the pace on the inside of two opponents, came up empty along the rail on the turn and retreated. BALTASAR jostled with a foe outside the three-quarter pole, was urged along off the pace, chased in the three path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and capitulated. CARMICHAEL jostled with a foe outside the three-quarter pole, was urged at the rear, went two to three wide on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Day
ENTRY.OWNER: Vintage Thoroughbreds LLC and Lynch Ben
ENTRY.COMMENT: came outward leaving chute,pressed off rail,rail turn,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Major Blue
ENTRY.OWNER: Ghent Bob Ghent Ann Lukas Laurie and Lukas D Wayne
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pace inside foe,2p-ins turn,3p into lane,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Baltasar
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled 3/4,urged along,chased 3p turn,4p into lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Carmichael
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled 3/4,urged at rear,2-3path turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Sky and Sand
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing and Magnifico Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside pace,vied 3-2path turn,clr ins 5/16,drew off,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Laughing Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged between early,advanced 4-5wide turn,6w into lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Patient Capital
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David Dubb Michael Skychai Racing LLC and Caruso
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside, chased 5-4path turn, weakened, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Claiming Purse 40000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPY BOB tossed his head and broke out at the start and was taken in hand conceding three to four lengths to the front, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge inside the final sixteenth and was just up in the shadow of the wire. CREATION OF ADAM a bit reluctant to load prior to the start, chased three to four wide from just off the pace, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a sixteenth from home, dug in under threat to the outside and was nailed at the finish. FAST BOAT TO SKYE coaxed from the gate, got coaxed along the inside in closest aim of the leader, swung three wide into upper stretch taking over command, dug in under threat coming out to look the challenger in the eye a furlong out, got collared near the sixteenth pole, kept on well clear of the rest to garner the show honors. FIRE BARON chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the half mile pole, tucked inside through the turn, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a bid, then flattened out in the late stages. ERIDROMOS coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the nine-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. RUN DIEM Z fractious in the gate prior to the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths under pressure and yielded the front near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. HINENI hustled from the gate, chased three paths off the inside down the backstretch and then five wide through the turn under coaxing from the half mile pole, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Eridromos
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Richard J Lugovich
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 9/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Boat to Skye
ENTRY.OWNER: Alifyfe Racing LLC and Mawaka Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, coaxed along ins, up 3w upper, collared 1/16, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Bob
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Linda and Italian Stallions Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, steady st, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, just up

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 1/2p, ins turn, ins 1/4, bid, flattened out

ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, yielded 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, 3w backstretch, 5w turn, 7-8w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, chased 3-4w, 5w upper, up 1/16, dug in, nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Fasig-Tipton Saratoga Oaks Invitational S. - Grade3 SARATOGA RACE 7 1 3/16M Turf CR: 105. Stakes Purse 400000. AN INVITATIONAL FOR FILLIES, THREE-YEARS-OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. In order to be eligible for entry into the Fasig-Tipton Saratoga Oaks Invitational, horses accepting the invitation must make a pre-entry payment of $2,000 (USD). An entry fee of $2,000 (USD) will be due at time of entry. The purse for the Fasig-Tipton Saratoga Oaks Invitational will be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fiftha nd 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight: 121 lbs. Trophies will be presented to the winning owner, trainer and jockey. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the Main Track. In the event that thii s race is taken off the turf, it may be subject to downgrading upon review by the Graded Stakes Committee. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELUSIVE PRINCESS (FR) was reserved on the inside under restraint while into the bit, shifted to the three path while roused late on the far turn, came out towards the outside fence while rallying about eleven to twelve wide into upper stretch, took over on the grandstand side coming to the furlong marker, kicked clear outside the sixteenth-pole and proved much the best under steady handling. AMERICAN SONJA (GB) went four wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside without cover, engaged the leader in the three path on the final turn, took the advantage outside the quarter-pole, brushed with PAPILIO while drifting eight to nine wide into upper stretch, lost the advantage outside the eighth-pole, rubbed saddles with PAPILIO while drifting out some in the final furlong and earned the place while no match for the winner. PAPILIO (IRE) moved from the two path to the four path while eager on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, went three wide while asked on the far turn, gained coming to the quarter-pole then made a bid, brushed with the runner-up while carried nine to ten wide into upper stretch, rubbed saddles with that opponent in the final furlong and also proved no match for the winner then missed the place but was well clear for the show. CAROLINE STREET was well placed just off the pace on the inside, came under urging on the far turn, shifted to the two path outside the quarter-pole, was driven four wide into upper stretch, drifted out in the final furlong and weakened. STRIKINGLY SPUN moved in early, went three wide on the first turn, settled towards the rear, was urged along while moving from three to five wide on the final turn and lacked the needed response. XIGERA rounded the first turn in the three path, stalked the pace under a tight hold, dropped back two then three wide on the far turn and capitulated. ALLAMERICANBEAUTY made light contact with a foe on the initial straightaway, was taken in hand between horses nearing the first turn, traveled three wide around that bend, settled in the middle of the field, came up empty in the two path on the final turn and dropped out. SELENAIA (IRE) moved in while going to the front, went around the opening bend in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, was asked while inside on the far turn, lost the lead outside the quarter-pole and faded. SOLO ALBUM dropped well behind early, saved ground on the first turn, lagged at the rear while off the rail on the backstretch, went three wide on the far turn and showed little. HONOR D LADY bumped lightly with a foe while under tight restraint early, went four then five wide on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, came up empty in the four path on the far turn and faltered.

ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners Barber Gary and Rocco Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind,ins1st turn,3w2nd turn,showed little

ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,2p1st,pace,ask rail 2nd turn,headed outside1/4,faded
